title: Task Manager for Android Wear
summary: Enjoy millions of the latest Android apps, games, music, movies, TV, books, magazines & more. Anytime, anywhere, across your devices.
developerAddress:
No. 51, YuanMingYuan Xi Road, Haidian Dist

description: The FIRST Task Manager for your new Android Wear Watch.  When your Watch runs slow, you can use it to free some memory, and stop the slow App. You can also use it to jump to the task running.- Full feature available on Android Wear Watch and Phone and Tablet- kill unused task- goto App- Display Memory Info- Display Detail Process InfoThis is the Android Wear version of our 'Task Manager':https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.xuecs.TaskManager
descriptionHTML:
The FIRST Task Manager for your new Android Wear Watch. When your Watch runs slow, you can use it to free some memory, and stop the slow App. You can also use it to jump to the task running.

- Full feature available on Android Wear Watch and Phone and Tablet
- kill unused task
- goto App
- Display Memory Info
- Display Detail Process Info

This is the Android Wear version of our 'Task Manager':
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.xuecs.TaskManager
